name: Flick It!
description: Flick it is an upcoming Mobile Game title developed by ShortRock This Prototype is uploaded for testing the GamePlay and feel of the Game. In this Game player has to defend the middle circle by Flicking the Arc by SPACEBAR and deflecting the Balls away! Lets see how far can you go! if you Make a Highscore Tweet it to us @ShortRock6 !(USE EARPHONES FOR BEST SOUND)
